alert.note: Alert for Levy (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 7:37PM EDT until May 30 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Levy County in northern Florida... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 737 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Andrews, or near Chiefland, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chiefland, Bronson, Fanning Springs, Otter Creek, Manattee Road and Andrews. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
